DOC.brief_summary: All patients undergoing carotid endarterectomy in Shaare Zedek Medical Hospital, during about 1 year, will be offered to participate. Retinal and choroidal structural changes will be assessed using swept-source OCT technology
DOC.criteria: Carotid stenosis requiring surgical management Ocular conditions: media opacities precluding fundus visualization, bilateral nolight perception Ocular surgery within 6 months prior to endarterectomy
